name: DATAHUNTER
description:
Game created for "Let's Make Typing Games Jam 2017". Caught this late so made it in about a day. Any and all feedback welcome!

https://itch.io/jam/typing-games-jam-2017

You are applying for a job as a "Datahunter" at Georgewell Inc. To be
eligible for the position you must pass their "Alphanumerical Manual
Input Test".

Press the corresponding letters/digits before they disappear. You must get a score of 65 or above to pass. Good luck!

Extra controls:

ESC - Quit Game

Q - Restart Game

Thanks to:

freesound.com for sounds

pngmart.com for PC image
